topic.title: Can popular zite like zerotalk and zeromall scale?
topic.body:
It seems every users of these zite are seeding the content submitted by every other uesrs of these zites. When the zite become more popular, would it be no longer substable for each node (be desktop/laptop/mobile) to sync and store all the content?

The design of zerome seems more scalable, where ideally, each users can post to their own hubs, and their hub can be linked to some shared meta hub for content discovery.

1600058531_1DXZmTjSE5xjmyx2NiH3jpbKQ3UTC.body:
Using tags maybe more appreciate than sections.
For instance, the porn example you listed is more about technical issue with zite, not really related to porn content.

1600039815_13UJZwpkQASN9unpc9hLhmwyauXzz.body: Nothing is eternal, people comes and goes

1607575526_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: What is MSM? Is it some kind of 3rd party online advertising ?
